response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This unique offering is not just a product; it's an experience tailored to elevate your needs and preferences. Given its exceptional quality and versatility, we believe its value surpasses $8,000. Considering this, I'm extending you the opportunity to acquire it at an exclusive introductory price of $7,500. This special offer is designed to ensure you have the chance to experience the unparalleled benefits of our product without any compromise on quality. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 7500}
